markdownRemark.html: Searching for obscure functions, commands, and signs like anova(, the not equal to sign â‰ , and many others can be challenging. The easiest way to find any command on your TI-84 graphing calculator is to go to 2nd catalog (Hint: It's at the bottom!). From here, every possible command that you can perform on your graphing calculator can be found in this list.

frontmatter.title: How to Find Any Command, Sign, or Function on Your TI 84 PLUS CE
